plaintiff: Plaintiff claims violation of Right to Equality under Article 14 due to discriminatory hiring practices.
defendant: Defendant argues merit-based selection without discrimination.

plaintiff: Worker alleges violation of Right to Life under Article 21 due to unsafe working conditions.
defendant: Company claims compliance with all safety regulations.
evidence: Safety audit reports and accident records.
legal_basis: Article 21 - Right to Life and Personal Liberty

plaintiff: Citizen challenges detention without trial under Article 22.
defendant: State argues national security concerns justified detention.
legal_basis: Article 22 - Protection against arrest and detention

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges defamation under Section 499 IPC.
defendant: Defendant claims statements were truthful and in public interest.

plaintiff: Landlord files eviction suit under Transfer of Property Act.
defendant: Tenant claims protected tenancy rights.

plaintiff: Consumer alleges fraud under Section 420 IPC.
defendant: Seller denies fraudulent intent and provides transaction records.

plaintiff: Wife files for maintenance under Section 125 CrPC.
defendant: Husband claims inability to pay due to unemployment.

plaintiff: Employee claims wrongful termination violating Article 19(1)(g).
defendant: Employer argues termination for misconduct with proper procedure.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges breach of contract under Indian Contract Act.
defendant: Defendant claims force majeure circumstances.

plaintiff: Victim files case under Section 354 IPC for outraging modesty.
defendant: Accused denies charges and provides alibi.

plaintiff: Property owner claims adverse possession under Limitation Act.
defendant: Original owner contests claim with title deeds.

plaintiff: Worker files case under Workmen Compensation Act for injury.
defendant: Employer denies liability citing worker negligence.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges violation of Right to Freedom of Speech under Article 19(1)(a).
defendant: Government argues reasonable restrictions under Article 19(2).

plaintiff: Consumer files case under Consumer Protection Act for defective goods.
defendant: Manufacturer claims proper usage instructions were provided.

plaintiff: Plaintiff claims copyright infringement under Copyright Act.
defendant: Defendant argues fair use doctrine.

plaintiff: Victim files case under Section 498A IPC for cruelty.
defendant: Accused claims false allegations for extortion.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges medical negligence under tort law.
defendant: Doctor claims standard medical procedures were followed.

plaintiff: Employee claims discrimination under Article 16.
defendant: Employer argues legitimate business reasons for decision.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files suit for recovery of money under Civil Procedure Code.
defendant: Defendant claims debt was already repaid.

plaintiff: Accused challenges conviction under Section 302 IPC.
defendant: State presents circumstantial evidence and motive.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges violation of Right to Privacy under Article 21.
defendant: Defendant claims lawful surveillance under proper authorization.

plaintiff: Minor's guardian claims compensation under Motor Vehicles Act.
defendant: Driver argues contributory negligence of victim.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges domestic violence under Protection of Women Act.
defendant: Respondent denies allegations and provides character witnesses.

plaintiff: Employee claims sexual harassment under Vishakha Guidelines.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files PIL for environmental protection under Article 21.

evidence: Environmental impact assessment and monitoring data.

plaintiff: Victim files case under SC/ST Prevention of Atrocities Act.
defendant: Accused denies caste-based discrimination.

plaintiff: Plaintiff claims partition of joint Hindu family property.
defendant: Defendant argues improper partition procedure.

plaintiff: Worker alleges violation of minimum wage under Minimum Wages Act.
defendant: Employer claims payments were as per applicable rates.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files case for divorce under Hindu Marriage Act.

evidence: Marriage certificate and evidence of cruelty.

plaintiff: Accused challenges preventive detention under Article 22.
defendant: State argues detention necessary for public order.
evidence: Detention order and grounds of detention.

plaintiff: Plaintiff claims trademark infringement under Trade Marks Act.
defendant: Defendant argues different market segment.

plaintiff: Employee files case under Payment of Gratuity Act.
defendant: Employer argues employee not eligible.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges forgery under Section 463 IPC.
defendant: Defendant denies involvement and provides alibi.

plaintiff: Tenant claims protection under Rent Control Act.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files case under Negotiable Instruments Act for dishonored cheque.
defendant: Drawer claims insufficient funds due to bank error.

plaintiff: Worker claims compensation under Factories Act for injury.
defendant: Factory owner argues safety norms were followed.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges illegal detention under Article 22(1).
defendant: Police claim arrest was lawful with proper procedure.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files suit for specific performance under Contract Act.
defendant: Defendant argues impossibility of performance.

plaintiff: Victim files case under Section 376 IPC for rape.
defendant: Accused denies charges and claims consensual relationship.

plaintiff: Employee claims unfair labor practice under Industrial Disputes Act.
defendant: Management argues business exigency.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges violation of Right to Education under Article 21A.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files case for recovery under Money Lending Act.

plaintiff: Accused challenges conviction under Section 307 IPC.

plaintiff: Plaintiff claims injunction under Code of Civil Procedure.
defendant: Defendant argues no prima facie case.

plaintiff: Worker files case under Equal Remuneration Act.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges arbitrary action violating Article 14.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files case under Right to Information Act for denied information.

plaintiff: Victim files case under Dowry Prohibition Act.

plaintiff: Plaintiff claims patent infringement under Patents Act.
defendant: Defendant argues independent invention.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files case under Protection of Plant Varieties Act.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges breach of fiduciary duty under Company Law.

plaintiff: Worker claims benefit under Employees State Insurance Act.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files case under Geographical Indications Act.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files suit for declaration under Specific Relief Act.

plaintiff: Worker files case under Contract Labour Act.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges age discrimination under Article 15.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files case under Seeds Act for spurious seeds.

plaintiff: Plaintiff claims maintenance under Hindu Adoption and Maintenance Act.

plaintiff: Employee alleges illegal strike break under Trade Unions Act.
defendant: Management argues strike was illegal.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges violation of Article 19(1)(c) right to form associations.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files case under Arbitration Act challenging award.

plaintiff: Worker claims benefit under Employees Provident Fund Act.

plaintiff: Plaintiff files case under Designs Act for design infringement.

plaintiff: Employee claims bonus under Payment of Bonus Act.

plaintiff: Employee claims leave encashment as per standing orders.

plaintiff: Plaintiff alleges harassment violating Article 21.
